Class ContentInfo

java.lang.Object
ContentInfo
public class ContentInfo
extends java.lang.Object
This class gets info about a URL

    • isImage

      public boolean isImage() throws java.io.IOException
      Returns true if the content type of the URL is an image, false if it does not contain an image.
      Returns:
      true or false
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when URL is dead

    • isText

      public boolean isText() throws java.io.IOException
      Returns true if the content type of the URL is a text, false if it does not contain text
      Returns:
      true or false
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when URL is dead

    • getImageSize

      public java.awt.Dimension getImageSize() throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.IllegalStateException
      If URL is an image this returns the dimensions of the image as a Dimension class
      Returns:
      dimensions as a Dimension object (length and width in int)
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when URL is dead
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - when is not an image

    • getLastModified

      public java.util.Date getLastModified() throws java.io.IOException

      the date as a Date class
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when URL is dead

    • getLineCount

      public int getLineCount() throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.IllegalStateException
      If the file is a text this returns the # of lines in the file
      Returns:
      # of lines as an int
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when URL is dead
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - when is not text file
